pkgmetadata.longdescription: Power Analysis for Meta-Analysis // A simple and effective tool for computing meta-analytic statistical power for main effects, tests of homogeneity, and categorical moderator models. All equations are described in Pigott (2012) doi:10.1007/978-1-4614-2278-5, Hedges Pigott (2004) doi:10.1037/1082-989X.9.4.426, and Borenstein, Hedges, Higgins, Rothstein (2009) doi:10.1002/9780470743386.
